fields.description: List of exclusions that override the default access mode settings for specific private endpoint connections.
fields.name: Exclusions

fields.description: Specifies the default access mode of ingestion through associated private endpoints in scope. If not specified default value is 'Open'. You can override this default setting for a specific private endpoint connection by adding an exclusion in the 'exclusions' array.
fields.name: IngestionAccessMode

fields.description: Specifies the default access mode of queries through associated private endpoints in scope. If not specified default value is 'Open'. You can override this default setting for a specific private endpoint connection by adding an exclusion in the 'exclusions' array.
fields.name: QueryAccessMode
